item.title: 1009 DIS
item.description: score:1009 Chances: Disney’s operating income increased by 23% in one of its segments, indicating positive growth opportunities. The upcoming report on Disney’s fiscal third-quarter results may provide insights into its plans for ESPN, Disney+, and other segments. Liberty Media delivered impressive earnings and revenue surprises, which might indicate positive momentum for Disney as well.
